data CreateProcess = CreateProcess {
  • cmdspec :: CmdSpec
  • cwd :: Maybe FilePath
  • env :: Maybe [(String, String)]
  • std_in :: StdStream
  • std_out :: StdStream
  • std_err :: StdStream
  • close_fds :: Bool
  • create_group :: Bool
  • delegate_ctlc :: Bool
  • detach_console :: Bool
  • create_new_console :: Bool
  • new_session :: Bool
  • child_group :: Maybe GroupID
  • child_user :: Maybe UserID
  • use_process_jobs :: Bool
}
name: CreateProcess CreateProcess cmdspec cwd env std_in std_out std_err close_fds create_group delegate_ctlc detach_console create_new_console new_session child_group child_user use_process_jobs
